name: ATKMTN Presents: The Attack Pack - Two rad 2D PC Games
blurb: A spy-thriller. A sci-fi mystery. Gaming opposites collide in THE ATTACK PACK by Attack Mountain.

rewards.reward: 'ON THE CHEAP' TIER: You'll secure yourself a delicious DRM-free copy of ATK PK 1 at a reduced price! When it actually comes out it'll be a few bucks more, so if you want in cheap, here's your tier.

'YOU'RE A GOOD PERSON' TIER: This tier grabs you a copy of the game, as well as a special thanks in the credits of either SOS or the Grey Man - your choice! It's because you're a good person and we care about you. (If you donate $15 or more, we'll make it both games!)

NEW! 'STANDARD WALLPAPER EDITION' TIER: The EXTREME WALLPAPER EDITION too extreme for you? It's understandable. At this tier you'll get a copy of ATTACK PACK ONE, a special thanks in the credits of BOTH games, and one random wallpaper from the game of your choice! You'll get this immediately following the end of the campaign - just answer your survey question when it comes in and we'll shoot it right over! (Estimated delivery for WALLPAPERS ONLY)

'EXTREME WALLPAPER EDITION' TIER: At this tier you get a special thanks in the credits, a copy of the game and a super rad pack of wallpapers - 5 in total - featuring rocking art by Dudu Torres. You'll get these shortly after the campaign ends so you can be reminded about how excited you are for ATKPK1 each time you turn on your local computer machine. (Estimated delivery listed is for WALLPAPER only)

'DIGITAL ART BOOK' TIER: Dig it: A copy of ATKPK1. Wallpapers. Special thanks in the credits. On top of all that, you're also going to get a digital art book packed to the brim with awesome concept art. It'll include the images you're seeing here AND whatever ones we wind up making during production! Now that's a wheel of a deal!

NEW! EARLY ACCESS! 'SOS BOSS FIGHT BUILD' TIER: If you GOTTA get a taste of THE ATTACK PACK right away, this is the tier for you. At this tier, you'll snag a copy of the very same BOSS FIGHT BUILD from SOS that we are offering during our Kickstarter's LET'S PLAY event! In it, you'll take on the dangerous Lt. Fanibhusan from the 'Might of the Steel Hand' episode of the game in a timed battle. What's the best time you can get? Only one way to find out! (You'll get this demo within 24 hours of the Kickstarter's end!)

'AUDIO SOUND NOISE' TIER: Ah, this tier means you must be a man or woman of the audio arts. You get ATK PK 1, a special thanks, wallpapers, the digital art book, and then you also get a digital copy of the OST - composed by Hyperduck Soundworks - when it's released. You're technically getting TWO soundtracks here, boys and girls - and they are both going to be awesome.

'THE ATK CODE' TIER: Want to be on the inside? Want to go on a little adventure? This is the tier for you. In addition to every other unlimited reward listed, you'll get a special PDF packed with our personal development sketches - the stuff right out of our development notebooks. Hidden within the walls of these notes is the legendary ATK Code - when entered on the title screen of any Attack Mountain game, it unlocks some radical, game-changing stuff. The only way you're going to get this code otherwise is by waiting for it to creep out on the internet. Why not be a trendsetter and be the hip guy or gal that gets it out there?

'THE ATK PATCH' TIER: Oh, so you're one of those guys - we don't mind! Be yourself! If you like patches, patch it up with this tier, which provides you with two awesome patches pulled from a random pool of patchified SOS and Grey Man sprites. We'll make sure you get one from each game. These are gonna take a while to make and ship but we'll do it for you. (Estimated delivery is for PATCHES only)

'ATKPK CASSETTE PACK': Now here is a special tier that will make your local cassette player happy: Your generosity nets you a custom, one of a kind cassette tape with a selection of songs from SOS and Grey Man! Only 150 of these are being made, and they're all random colors. Jump on this now if you want one of these unique collectibles! (You also get everything in the previous unlimited tiers of course!)

'I WANT TO BE A PAST SPY' TIER: This tier is super crazy, especially for the asking price - The Agency in SOS has a long line of now-deceased or retired agents, who have all been commemorrated in a very special, albeit subtle, way in-game. Perhaps\u2026you were one of them? Included for free are your agent number as well as your current status. Did you get blown up in the line of duty? Did you retire fat and happy? Only one way to find out! (PS - the earlier you get in on this tier the cooler and older your dossier is!)

'I WANT TO CAMP IT UP IN THE GREY MAN' TIER: Oh mama, if you are into the Grey Man do we have a tier for you. In addition to all of the non-limited tiers, you'll see yourself transform into a CAMPER in THE GREY MAN! There are some limitations - you ain't gonna have a unique body, but we WILL use your beautiful face to create the character's head. He'll also have your first name and the most hilarious last name we can think of. We're only doing FIVE of these, so jump on it fast!

'FOUNDERS CLUB' TIER - If you're serious about securing the future of ATKMTN, this is how to show it. As thanks for this incredibly generous pledge, you'll receive a lifetime subscription to the Attack Pack line! Whether there are 50 or 100 million, you'll get every last one of them. We'll also place you in our special 'Founders Club', which will net you a special thanks in every ATKPK game we make. Basically, you're the best and we love you.
